SELECT A.AD_NO, B.BUS_NO, B.BUS_NAME, B.BUS_IMAGES, POSITION, (SELECT COUNT(B.BUS_NO) FROM ENROLL_POSITION WHERE SYSDATE < DEAD_DATE AND STATUS = 'Y') AS PO_COUNT FROM BUSINESS_INFO B JOIN ADVERTISEMENT A ON (B.BUS_NO = A.BUS_NO) JOIN ENROLL_POSITION P ON (A.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO) WHERE A.AD_TYPE = 'MAIN' AND SYSDATE < A.AD_END_DATE AND SYSDATE < P.DEAD_DATE AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
